title: 비교 표현 어휘
description: 비교급과 최상급에 자주 사용되는 형용사와 부사를 배웁니다.

words.example: He is taller than his brother.
words.exampleMeaning: 그는 그의 형보다 키가 더 크다.

additionalExamples.sentence: She is the tallest in her class.

words.example: This book is shorter than that one.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 책이 저 책보다 더 짧다.

words.example: Tokyo is bigger than Seoul.
words.exampleMeaning: 도쿄는 서울보다 더 크다.
words.mnemonic: Big = 큰 (자음 두 번: bigger, biggest)

confusableWords.difference: Big은 일상적, Large는 좀 더 격식

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the biggest pizza I've seen.
additionalExamples.meaning: 이것은 내가 본 가장 큰 피자다.

words.example: My room is smaller than yours.
words.exampleMeaning: 내 방은 너의 방보다 더 작다.

additionalExamples.sentence: Can I have a smaller size?

words.example: Today is hotter than yesterday.
words.exampleMeaning: 오늘이 어제보다 더 덥다.
words.mnemonic: Hot = 뜨겁다 (자음 두 번: hotter, hottest)

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the hottest day of the year.

words.example: Winter is colder than autumn.
words.exampleMeaning: 겨울이 가을보다 더 춥다.

words.example: This car is faster than that one.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 차가 저 차보다 더 빠르다.

words.example: The bus is slower than the subway.
words.exampleMeaning: 버스가 지하철보다 더 느리다.

words.example: This test is easier than the last one.
words.exampleMeaning: 이번 시험이 지난 시험보다 더 쉽다.

confusableWords.difference: Easy는 어렵지 않은, Simple은 복잡하지 않은

words.example: Math is more difficult than English for me.
words.exampleMeaning: 내게는 수학이 영어보다 더 어렵다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the most difficult problem.

words.example: This restaurant is more expensive than that one.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 식당이 저 식당보다 더 비싸다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the most expensive car.

words.example: Online shopping is cheaper than shopping in stores.
words.exampleMeaning: 온라인 쇼핑이 매장 쇼핑보다 더 저렴하다.

words.example: This movie is more interesting than that one.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 영화가 저 영화보다 더 흥미롭다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the most interesting book.

words.example: The lecture was more boring than I expected.
words.exampleMeaning: 강의가 내가 예상했던 것보다 더 지루했다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the most boring movie.

words.example: Paris is one of the most beautiful cities in the world.
words.exampleMeaning: 파리는 세계에서 가장 아름다운 도시 중 하나다.

additionalExamples.sentence: She is more beautiful than anyone.

words.example: This pizza is better than the one we had yesterday.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 피자가 우리가 어제 먹었던 것보다 더 좋다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the best day ever.

words.example: Today's weather is worse than yesterday's.
words.exampleMeaning: 오늘 날씨가 어제보다 더 나쁘다.

words.example: My house is farther from school than yours.
words.exampleMeaning: 내 집이 너의 집보다 학교에서 더 멀다.

words.example: Tokyo is more modern than many other cities.
words.exampleMeaning: 도쿄는 많은 다른 도시들보다 더 현대적이다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the most modern building.

words.example: Soccer is more popular than baseball in most countries.
words.exampleMeaning: 대부분의 나라에서 축구가 야구보다 더 인기가 있다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the most popular song.

words.example: My grandfather is older than my grandmother.
words.exampleMeaning: 우리 할아버지가 할머니보다 나이가 더 많다.

confusableWords.difference: Old는 일반적, Elder는 가족 중 손위

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the oldest building here.

words.example: She is younger than her sister.
words.exampleMeaning: 그녀는 언니보다 나이가 어리다.

additionalExamples.sentence: He is the youngest in the family.

words.example: This phone is newer than mine.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 전화기가 내 것보다 더 새것이다.

words.example: This box is heavier than that one.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 상자가 저것보다 더 무겁다.

words.example: A feather is lighter than a stone.
words.exampleMeaning: 깃털은 돌보다 더 가볍다.

words.example: He is stronger than me.
words.exampleMeaning: 그는 나보다 더 힘이 세다.

words.example: The patient is weaker today.
words.exampleMeaning: 환자가 오늘 더 약해졌다.

words.example: Her hair is longer than mine.
words.exampleMeaning: 그녀의 머리카락이 내 것보다 더 길다.

confusableWords.difference: Long은 수평 길이, Tall은 수직 높이

words.example: This road is wider than that street.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 도로가 저 거리보다 더 넓다.

words.example: This alley is narrower than I thought.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 골목이 생각보다 더 좁다.

words.example: The ocean is deeper than any lake.
words.exampleMeaning: 바다는 어떤 호수보다도 더 깊다.

words.example: This paper is thinner than cardboard.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 종이가 판지보다 더 얇다.

words.example: This book is thicker than that one.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 책이 저 책보다 더 두껍다.

words.example: This mountain is higher than that hill.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 산이 저 언덕보다 더 높다.

words.example: Today's temperature is lower than yesterday.
words.exampleMeaning: 오늘 온도가 어제보다 더 낮다.

words.example: I am happier today than yesterday.
words.exampleMeaning: 나는 오늘 어제보다 더 행복하다.

words.example: She looks sadder than before.
words.exampleMeaning: 그녀가 전보다 더 슬퍼 보인다.

words.example: This room is quieter than the other.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 방이 다른 방보다 더 조용하다.

words.example: The music is louder than before.
words.exampleMeaning: 음악이 전보다 더 시끄럽다.

words.example: This room is cleaner than mine.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 방이 내 방보다 더 깨끗하다.

words.example: My shoes are dirtier than yours.
words.exampleMeaning: 내 신발이 네 것보다 더 더럽다.

words.example: This area is safer than the city center.
words.exampleMeaning: 이 지역이 도심보다 더 안전하다.

words.example: Driving fast is more dangerous than walking.
words.exampleMeaning: 빨리 운전하는 것이 걷는 것보다 더 위험하다.

additionalExamples.sentence: This is the most dangerous sport.

words.example: Vegetables are healthier than fast food.
words.exampleMeaning: 채소가 패스트푸드보다 더 건강하다.

words.example: Grandpa is wiser than anyone.
words.exampleMeaning: 할아버지는 누구보다 현명하다.

additionalExamples.sentence: He is the wisest person I know.
additionalExamples.meaning: 그는 내가 아는 가장 현명한 사람이다.

words.example: Today is busier than yesterday.
words.exampleMeaning: 오늘이 어제보다 더 바쁘다.

words.example: I arrived later than expected.
words.exampleMeaning: 나는 예상보다 늦게 도착했다.

words.example: I woke up earlier than usual.
words.exampleMeaning: 나는 평소보다 일찍 일어났다.

words.example: The park is nearer than the mall.
words.exampleMeaning: 공원이 쇼핑몰보다 더 가깝다.

words.example: Our garden is larger than theirs.
words.exampleMeaning: 우리 정원이 그들 것보다 더 크다.

exercises.question: What is the comparative form of 'tall'?
What is the superlative form of 'big'?
exercises.explanation: 'big'은 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -est를 붙여 'biggest'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: This book is _____ than that one. (interesting)
Summer is _____ than spring. (hot)
exercises.explanation: 'hot'은 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -er을 붙여 'hotter'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: What is the comparative form of 'good'?
What is the superlative form of 'bad'?
This is the _____ movie I've ever seen. (beautiful)
My car is _____ yours. (fast, as...as)
exercises.explanation: 동등 비교는 'as + 형용사 + as' 형태를 사용합니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: She is more tall than me.
She is the taller than me.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: This is the most expensive restaurant.
exercises.answer: This is the most expensive restaurant.
exercises.explanation: 긴 형용사의 최상급은 'the most + 형용사' 형태이며, 반드시 'the'를 붙입니다.

exercises.question: English is _____ than Chinese for me. (easy)
This is _____ day of my life. (good, superlative)
What is the comparative form of 'far'?
Soccer is _____ sport in the world. (popular, superlative)
exercises.explanation: 긴 형용사의 최상급은 'the most + 형용사' 형태입니다.

exercises.question: Which word has an irregular comparative form?
This room is _____ than the kitchen. (clean)
What is the superlative form of 'heavy'?
My grandfather is _____ than my father. (old)
Which is the correct comparative of 'thin'?
exercises.explanation: 'thin'은 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -er을 붙여 'thinner'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: This test was _____ than the last one. (difficult)
What is the superlative form of 'young'?
Winter is _____ than autumn. (cold)
Which sentence is correct?
options: This is the more dangerous road.
This is the most dangerous road.
exercises.answer: This is the most dangerous road.

exercises.question: She is _____ than her brother. (happy)
What is the comparative form of 'wide'?
The Pacific Ocean is _____ than the Atlantic. (deep)
Which word uses 'more' for the comparative?
This street is _____ than that one. (narrow)
What is the superlative of 'sad'?
exercises.explanation: 'sad'는 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -est를 붙여 'saddest'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: My bag is _____ than yours. (light)
비교급과 원형을 연결하세요.
Which is correct?
options: He is more strong than me.
He is the stronger than me.

exercises.question: Today I arrived _____ than yesterday. (early)
What is the superlative form of 'safe'?
This movie is _____ than the book. (boring)
exercises.explanation: 'boring'은 -ing로 끝나는 긴 형용사이므로 'more boring'으로 비교급을 만듭니다.

exercises.question: Which is the correct superlative of 'busy'?
This box is _____ than that one. (thick)
What is the comparative of 'new'?
The library is _____ than the mall. (quiet)
Which is the correct superlative of 'high'?
Her room is _____ than mine. (dirty)
최상급과 원형을 연결하세요.
Which sentence is correct?
options: My house is more near than yours.
My house is nearer than yours.
My house is nearest than yours.
My house is the nearer than yours.
exercises.answer: My house is nearer than yours.

exercises.question: This problem is _____ than I thought. (easy)
What is the comparative form of 'low'?
He is _____ person I know. (wise, superlative)
Which is the correct comparative of 'loud'?
This garden is _____ than theirs. (large)
What is the superlative of 'long'?
Vegetables are _____ than fast food. (healthy)
Which is the correct superlative of 'weak'?
The music is _____ than before. (loud)
What is the comparative of 'late'?
This is _____ building in our city. (tall, superlative)
형용사와 비교급을 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: 짧은 모음 + 자음으로 끝나는 형용사는 자음을 두 번 쓰고 -er을 붙입니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: She is the most beautiful girl.
exercises.answer: She is the most beautiful girl.

exercises.question: Today's weather is _____ than yesterday's. (bad)
What is the superlative of 'slow'?
My brother is _____ than me. (strong)
Which is the correct comparative of 'modern'?
This road is _____ than the highway. (safe)
-y로 끝나는 형용사의 비교급을 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: -y로 끝나는 형용사는 y를 i로 바꾸고 -er을 붙입니다.

exercises.question: What is the comparative of 'cheap'?
This is _____ movie I've ever watched. (interesting, superlative)
Which is the correct superlative of 'far'?
The park is _____ than the mall from here. (near)
Which sentence is correct?
options: This is more easy than that.
This is the easier than that.

exercises.question: He is _____ player on the team. (good, superlative)
What is the comparative of 'short'?
My sister is _____ than me. (young)
-e로 끝나는 형용사의 비교급을 연결하세요.
Which is the correct superlative of 'popular'?
This blanket is _____ than that one. (thick)
What is the comparative of 'small'?
January is _____ month of the year. (cold, superlative)
Which word does NOT double the consonant in comparative?
exercises.explanation: 'fast'는 모음이 짧지만 -st로 끝나므로 자음을 두 번 쓰지 않습니다.

exercises.question: The Amazon is _____ river in the world. (long, superlative)
불규칙 비교급/최상급을 연결하세요.
Which sentence is correct?
options: This coffee is hoter than that.
This coffee is hotter than that.
This coffee is more hot than that.
This coffee is the hotter than that.
exercises.answer: This coffee is hotter than that.
exercises.explanation: 'hot'은 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -er을 붙여 'hotter'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: This laptop is _____ than the old one. (light)
What is the superlative of 'clean'?
Today is _____ day of the week. (busy, superlative)
Which is the correct comparative of 'interesting'?
This street is _____ than the other one. (wide)
What is the superlative of 'deep'?
She looks _____ today than yesterday. (sad)
exercises.explanation: 'sad'는 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -er을 붙여 'sadder'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: 긴 형용사의 비교급을 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: 긴 형용사(2음절 이상)는 'more + 형용사'로 비교급을 만듭니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: Mount Everest is the higher mountain.
Mount Everest is the most high mountain.
Mount Everest is the highest mountain.
Mount Everest is the most highest mountain.
exercises.answer: Mount Everest is the highest mountain.

exercises.question: This paper is _____ than cardboard. (thin)
exercises.explanation: 'thin'은 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -er을 붙여 'thinner'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: What is the comparative of 'quiet'?
This is _____ weather this week. (bad, superlative)
Which is the correct superlative of 'narrow'?

exercises.explanation: 반대말 형용사도 같은 비교급 규칙을 따릅니다.

exercises.question: Which word is an irregular comparative?
This hotel is _____ than that one. (expensive)
What is the superlative of 'happy'?
He is _____ student in the class. (tall, superlative)
Which sentence is correct?
options: I am as tall than you.
I am as tall as you.
I am as taller as you.
exercises.answer: I am as tall as you.
exercises.explanation: 동등 비교는 'as + 형용사 원형 + as' 형태를 사용합니다.

exercises.question: This exercise is _____ than the last one. (difficult)

This car is _____ than the bus. (fast)
What is the comparative of 'boring'?
exercises.explanation: 'boring'은 -ing로 끝나는 긴 형용사이므로 'more boring'으로 비교급을 만듭니다.

exercises.question: She is _____ girl in our school. (popular, superlative)

Which sentence is correct?
options: This book is gooder than that.
This book is more good than that.
This book is better than that.
This book is the better than that.
exercises.answer: This book is better than that.

exercises.question: The patient is _____ today than yesterday. (weak)
What is the superlative of 'dangerous'?
This path is _____ than the road. (narrow)
Which is the correct comparative of 'healthy'?
My room is _____ than yours. (clean)
비교급 형태와 규칙을 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: 비교급 형성 규칙은 형용사 유형에 따라 다릅니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence uses the superlative correctly?
options: He is the taller in the class.
He is tallest in the class.
He is the tallest in the class.
He is most tall in the class.
exercises.answer: He is the tallest in the class.

exercises.question: Today I woke up _____ than usual. (late)

형용사의 세 가지 형태를 연결하세요.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: She runs more fast than me.

What is the superlative of 'new'?
His answer is _____ than mine. (good)

The ocean is _____ than the lake. (deep)

exercises.explanation: 동등 비교는 'as + 형용사 원형 + as' 형태를 사용합니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: This is the most cheapest option.
This is the more cheaper option.

exercises.question: The music is _____ than I expected. (loud)

exercises.explanation: 'hot'은 자음을 한 번 더 쓰고 -est를 붙여 'the hottest'가 됩니다.

exercises.question: Which is the correct comparative of 'safe'?
This movie is _____ than the book. (interesting)
최상급 형태와 규칙을 연결하세요.
exercises.explanation: 최상급 형성 규칙은 형용사 유형에 따라 다릅니다.

exercises.question: Which sentence uses comparison correctly?
options: He is more tall than his brother.
He is taller than his brother.
He is tallest than his brother.
He is the taller than his brother.
exercises.answer: He is taller than his brother.

What is the superlative of 'strong'?

exercises.answer: This is the most interesting story.

pairs.right: A is as tall as B
A is not as tall as B

exercises.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: Today is more cold than yesterday.
Today is the colder than yesterday.

exercises.question: This is _____ day of my life. (happy, superlative)
Which comparison rule is correct?
options: All adjectives can use both forms
exercises.explanation: 짧은 형용사(1음절, 일부 2음절)는 -er/-est를 붙여 비교급/최상급을 만듭니다.
